message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning methods to generate fake news, which falls under the category of natural language processing and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Additionally, the use of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) is mentioned in the abstract. Information retrieval (cs.IR) is also relevant as the paper discusses the collection of datasets. Finally, the presentation of the fake news as a media art project suggests the involvement of social and information networks (cs.SI).
